**Summary**
• Bitcoin holding steady, waiting for Friday’s jobs report.
• Fed’s September policy rides on this data, big implications.
• Traders are watching closely, ready to pounce on any signal.

Impact — Friday’s jobs data could send Bitcoin soaring or sinking based on the Fed’s next move.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://decrypt.co/338195/bitcoin-steady-fridays-upcoming-jobs-data
